pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Simple R-Based Implementation of a Trie (A.k.a. Digital Tree/Radix Tree/Prefix Tree) // A simple R-based implementation of a Trie (a.k.a. digital tree/radix tree/prefix tree) A trie, also called digital tree and sometimes radix tree or prefix tree is a kind of search tree. This ordered tree data structure is used to store a dynamic set or associative array where the keys are usually strings.
